榝字的基本解释

榝
shā
古书上说的茱萸一类的植物。

榝
xiè
櫼。
山桃。

榝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shā］
［《廣韻》所八切，入黠，生。］
［《廣韻》山列切，入薛，生。］
亦作“樧1”。
(1)植物名。即茱萸。
(2)木楔。

榝字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　榝； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页543第20
【唐韻】所八切【集韻】【韻會】山戛切，?音殺。【說文】似茱萸，出淮南。【唐韻】似茱萸而實赤。【爾雅·釋木】?榝醜莍。見椒字註。　又【廣韻】山列切，音近設。義同。【類篇】櫼也。一曰山桃。　又【集韻】私列切，音薛。側擊也。

榝字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
榝字的起名意思

古书上说的茱萸一类的植物。櫼。山桃。

Glutinous rice
Basic explanation of words
Glutinous rice
shā
Plants such as cornel in ancient books.
Glutinous rice
xiè
櫼.
Mountain peach.
Glutinous rice
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shā]
[The eight cuts in "Guangyun", enter the key, and are born. ]
["Guangyun" Shan Lie cuts, enters Xue, gives birth. ]
Also known as "樧1".
(1) Plant name. That is cornel.
(2) Wooden wedges.
Glutinous rice
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　榝; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 543-20
[Tang Yun] All eight cuts [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Shan Jia cuts, sound kills. [Said the text] Like cornel, it comes out of Huainan. 【Tang Yun】It resembles cornel but is really red. [Erya Shimu]? Ugly ugly. See Jiaozi Note.　[Guangyun] Mountain series cut, sound is close. The same meaning. 【Classes】Chu also. One said mountain peach.　[Jiyun] Privately cut, sound Xue. Flanking also.
Glutinous rice
